name: @n8n/n8n-nodes-langchain.outputParserItemList
semantic_context: Return the results as separate items

notice.displayName: This node must be connected to an AI chain. Insert one
notice.name: notice

options.name: options
numberOfItems
options.description: Defines how many items should be returned maximally. If set to -1, there is no limit.

options.name: separator
options.description: Defines the separator that should be used to split the results into separate items. Defaults to a new line but can be changed depending on the data that should be returned.

options.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。
